Name: subdbid
Description: OID of the database that the subscription resides in

Name: subenabled
Description: If true, the subscription is enabled and should be replicating

Name: subbinary
Description: If true, the subscription will request that the publisher send data in binary format

Name: substream
Description: If true, the subscription will allow streaming of in-progress transactions

Name: subconninfo
Description: Connection string to the upstream database

Name: subslotname
Description: Name of the replication slot in the upstream database (also used for the local replication origin name); null represents NONE

Name: subsynccommit
Description: The synchronous_commit setting for the subscription's workers to use

Name: subpublications
Description: Array of subscribed publication names. These reference publications defined in the upstream database. For more on publications see Section 31.1.
